content:
I am a third-year student at the University of Chicago studying Computer Science. My current interest is in Human Computer Interaction, but has the potential to change. On campus I am involved with reserach under Assistant Professor Marshini Chetty studying how children understand online privacy and security.
Here are my current roles within student clubs:
 Vice President of UChicago E-Sports Assitant Outreach Assitant of compileHer Co-Crisis Director of the Maori King Movement Committee of ChoMUN (UChicago’s MUN Conference) Director of Policy and Prevention Education of Pi Beta Phi IL Kappa Chapter  My interests outside of academics include video games (all types), food, taking pictures, and exploring Chicago. Feel free to chat with me about any of these topics!
summary: I am a third-year student at the University of Chicago studying Computer Science. My current interest is in Human Computer Interaction, but has the potential to change. On campus I am involved with reserach under Assistant Professor Marshini Chetty studying how children understand online privacy and security.
title: Lucy Li
